duties_responsibilities.duty: Reconcile cashiers' deposits and deposit daily in the cashier office.
Maintain all safes and cashier banks to ensure cash operations compliance.
Prepare and post journal entries based on accumulated data.
Generated reports according to established cash operations guidelines and time frames.
Reconcile invoices and send to the appropriate catering personnel.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent Required. Two-year Associate's degree or equivalent experience Preferred.
